author: Ingrid Miley
title: Staff redeployed to process Covid-19 welfare claims
description: Around 205 civil and public servants have been redeployed to the Department of Employment Affairs and Social Protection to help process an "unprecedented" flood of welfare claims due to the Covid-19 virus.
content:
Around 205 civil and public servants have been redeployed to the Department of Employment Affairs and Social Protection to help process an "unprecedented" flood of welfare claims due to the Covid-19 virus.
In a statement, the Department confirmed that it has… [+1679 chars]
